channel.title: J-RISE NEWS
channel.description: J-RISE Initiative公式のニュースフィード

item.title: Call for FY 2025 application of the FOREST (Fusion Oriented REsearch for disruptive Science and Technology) program is now open.
Minister of State, KIUCHI, held a briefing on the J-RISE Initiative at the Foreign Press Center Japan.
“EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) is now open and accepting applications from Japanese universities.
